name: Windows Legacy Update
summary: A WLU file is an unofficial update file used to update the Windows 2000, Windows XP, or Windows Millennium Edition operating systems . It contains one or more updates for Windows applications and files. WLU files and their installer, WLUpdator, are available for download at Windows Legacy Update's website (win2k.org/wlu/wlu.htm).

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
